channel.title: HTML5 Games
channel.description:
HTML5 games are games programmed using JavaScript and usually involve new HTML5 features like <audio> and <canvas>. JavaScript is getting better and better. So much better that companies like EA are already developing games with it and plan soon to develop games of PS2 quality. There's already a good amount of development going on and it's continuing steadily.
BrowserQuest MMORPG: http://browserquest.mozilla.org/ Angry Birds: http://chrome.angrybirds.com/ Canvas Rider: http://canvasrider.com/ Quake II Port: http://crystalin.dyndns.org:8080/GwtQuake.html
There are a lot more examples here: http://html5games.com/
Post any interesting HTML5 games here.
